tool.name: priceFlightOffer
tool.description: Get the final price and booking details for a selected flight offer. This validates the offer and provides accurate pricing including all taxes and fees. Use this after a user selects a flight from search results.

flight_offer.description: The complete flight offer object from search results that the user wants to price. This should include all itinerary, pricing, and traveler information.

when_to_use: After user selects a specific flight from search results
Before proceeding to booking to get final accurate price
When user asks 'how much is this flight' or 'what's the final price'
To validate flight availability and pricing before booking
workflow: 1. User searches for flights (use searchFlights tool)
4. Use priceFlightOffer with the selected flight offer object
5. Present final pricing details to user
6. Proceed to booking if user confirms
important_notes: Always use the complete flight offer object from search results
Prices may change between search and pricing - this gives the current accurate price
Check 'instantTicketingRequired' in response - if true, booking must be completed quickly
Include all traveler information from the original search
